code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetchUsers();},[]);const fetchUsers=async()=>{const res=await axios.get("http://localhost:3001/users");setUsers(res.data);};const addUser=async()=>{await axios.post("http://localhost:3001/users",{name,email});setName("");setEmail("");fetchUsers();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"User List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addUser,children:"Add User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:users.map(u=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[u.name," (",u.email,")"]},u.id))})]});}export default App;
